name: Winter Skill Driving Motorcycl
description:
Winter Skill Driving Motorcycle is a all new action-packed, exciting, motorbike simulator. Time to unleash your off-road motocross dirt bike skills on some of the most eXtreme winter snow covered mountain roads. Avoid falling rocks and treacherous cliffs as you race your motor cross sport bike as far as you can go.
Features:
- Incredible 3D graphics and animations.
- Easy and smooth driving controls.
- Amazing gameplay mode for all ages
- Quickly learn the story line of the game
- Amazing sound effects and background music.
- Different snowmobiles to drive.
